description: Borrowed from Sanskrit स्वरभक्ति (svára-bhakti, “vowel separation”), a compound of स्वर (svára, “vowel”) + भक्ति (bhaktí, “separation”).

entries.meaning: (linguistics, phonology) Epenthesis of a vowel, as in the football chant Engerland for England; anaptyxis.
examples: Svarabhakti is a common feature of northern Indian languages such as Hindi and Bengali.
